label: tube_room
verbose_description:
The room is lined with large, glass-fronted tubes like the one you woke up in.
The fluorescent lights  flicker on and off, buzzing. In the center of the room is a
metal operating table. A cart of surgical instruments is overturned nearby.
terse_description: You are in an operating room, lined with mysterious person-sized tubes

label: central_hallway_west
verbose_description:
The main hallway arcs overhead, and you stand on the western end. 
The dull thumping of enormous industrial fans comes from overhead, and 
their shadows spin crazily on the floor. There's a wide smear of blood on the grey-green 
tiles of the floor, starting under one of the nothern doors and growing gradually thinner
 as it extends out the main portal to the east.
terse_description: You are in the western end of the main hallway.

label: kitchen
verbose_description: It seems this was the facility's kitchen. The shelves are lined with empty boxes.

label: central_hallway_east
verbose_description:
You stand in the eastern half of the central hallway. There's a persistent mechanical hum
 on the fringes of your hearing. A thick trail of blood begins under the door to
 the north and leads out the main portal, growing thinner as it goes.
terse_description: You are in the east half of the main hallway.

label: outside
verbose_description:
You push out into the howling wind. It's hard to make anything out, but you think
 you can see the outline of a small structure to the south. The blood trail, frozen under a layer
 of ice, leads that direction.
terse_description: You are outside the main facility. It is very cold.

label: garage
verbose_description:
You step out of the wind and into the structure. This looks like the garage--
 helmets and empty gas cans are spread around the floor. There is room for 
three or four snowmobiles here, but only one is left.

label: reactor_entrance
verbose_description:
The stairs lead down into a small room with thick metal walls.
A bright yellow sign bears something that looks like the radioactivity symbol, but pointier,
 with text below it. Two red suits hang from hooks on the wall.
terse_description: You are at the entrance to the reactor.

label: reactor
verbose_description: This small room is suffused with dim green light. A thick cylinder is set into the center of the otherwise bare floor.
terse_description: You are in the reactor core.

label: lab
verbose_description: Laboratory benches and a glass-fronted refrigerator line the walls. The blood trail leads to the refrigerator.

label: closet
verbose_description:
You are in a small walk-in closet. There is space here to hold enough artic equipment
 for three or four people to travel through the cold safely, but most of the 
hangers and shelves are empty now.
